thread.title: Listen to Wizkid Reconnect With Drake on “Come Closer”
thread.title_full: Listen to Wizkid Reconnect With Drake on “Come Closer”

author: Jacob Davey
title: Listen to Wizkid Reconnect With Drake on “Come Closer”
text:
Drake and Wizkid have joined forces again for more summertime, pheromone-inducing goodness on “Come Closer.” The pair officially reconnect for the first time since their international chart-topping anthem “One Dance” (not counting a leaked recording of a track titled “Hush Up the Silence” that emerged last month), and this track follows a similar formula that made “One Dance” so successful.
Marking the transition into lighter evenings via it’s silky-smooth afrobeat pulsations, “Come Closer” has been produced with every intention of Drake being rattled out of many a trunk on a main road near you yet again this summer. Listen below.

In other music news, you can stream Kodak Black’s new album ‘Painting Pictures’ right here .
